channel.description: Recent content in talks on Sachita Nishal

item.title: Talk + Responses: Blueprints for Evaluating AI in Journalism
item.description: Yesterday I delivered a short talk at Aspen Digital’s event called AI & News: Charting the Course. It was hosted at the Ford Foundation Center for Social Justice in NYC, which is a really pretty venue. They have so many trees inside! And also apprently: birds1! Here’s the slide deck for this talk, made under a certain degree of sleep deprivation-based duress and fever brain. Pretty trees! This was a really fun time for me for a bunch of reasons.
